<title level="1" pfs="">[Jellico Bounce-Bounce](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2003)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 26

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Jellico Bounce-Bounce](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2003)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On](/Sources.aspx?ID=21) pg. 28</row>

**Perception** +7

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +7, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +3

**Con** +1

**Int** +2

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
bowling pins, clown costume, [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3) (6), pots of grease paint

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 32

**Bob and Weave** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** Jellico is the target of a Strike by an attacker he can see; **Effect** Jellico gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering Strike.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
bowling pin +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)),
**Damage** 1d6+2 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+2 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
bowling pin +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+2 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+2 piercing

**Bounce** <actions string="Single Action" />  Jellico makes a [High Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=36) or [Long Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=37)

**Bounce-Bounce** <actions string="Two Actions" />  Jellico Strides up to his Speed and does not trigger reactions during this movement.

**Juggler**   If Jellico's bowling pin ranged Strike hits, the bowling pin bounces off the target back toward Jellico. Jellico can catch it again if he has a free hand.

</column>
name: Jellico Bounce-Bounce

text: Jellico Bounce-Bounce Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 26 Unspecific Lore : DC 24 Specific Lore : DC 21 Jellico Bounce-Bounce Source Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On pg. 28 Perception +7 Languages Skills Acrobatics +7, Performance +7, Stealth +7, Thievery +9 Str +2 Dex +3 Con +1 Int +2 Wis +0 Cha +1 Items bowling pins, clown costume, Dagger (6), pots of grease paint --- AC 17 Fort +7 Ref +9 Will +6 HP 32 Bob and Weave Reaction Trigger Jellico is the target of a Strike by an attacker he can see; Effect Jellico gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering Strike. --- Speed 30 feet Melee Single Action bowling pin +9 (Agile, Nonlethal), Damage 1d6+2 bludgeoning Melee Single Action dagger +10 (Agile, Finesse, versatile S), Damage 1d4+2 piercing Ranged Single Action bowling pin +10 (Agile, Nonlethal, thrown 10 feet), Damage 1d6+2 bludgeoning Melee Single Action dagger +10 (Agile, thrown 10 feet, versatile S), Damage 1d4+2 piercing Bounce Single Action Jellico makes a High Jump or Long Jump Bounce-Bounce Two Actions Jellico Strides up to his Speed and does not trigger reactions during this movement. Juggler If Jellico's bowling pin ranged Strike hits, the bowling pin bounces off the target back toward Jellico. Jellico can catch it again if he has a free hand.
